channel.title: Home on Step by step
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Step by step

item.title: Fish
item.description: Configuration help for fish config.fish set path doc fish_add_path /path/to/bin Change path shortening threshold doc set -g fish_prompt_pwd_dir_length 10 Make use of !! source -> (see also) function bind_bang switch (commandline -t)[-1] case "!" commandline -t -- $history[1] commandline -f repaint case "*" commandline -i ! end end function bind_dollar switch (commandline -t)[-1] case "!" commandline -f backward-delete-char history-token-search-backward case "*" commandline -i '$' end end function fish_user_key_bindings bind ! bind_bang bind '$' bind_dollar end

item.title: Git
item.description: Git log See single commit info git log -n 1 --decorate Compact tree view git log --graph --decorate Stash Default stash is stash@{0} General info git stash show stash@{N} Diff the stash will introduce git stash show -p stash@{N} Diff with branch git diff stash stash@{N} branch

item.title: SSH
item.description: Reset known host for hostname ssh-keygen -R $hostname Create generic SSH key ssh-keygen -a 1000 -t ed25519 -f $outfile -C "host-user->target"

item.title: Wireguard
item.description: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/WireGuard Host [Interface] Address = 10.0.0.1/32 ListenPort = 51821 PrivateKey = # wg genkey > host.key [Peer] PublicKey = # client's pubkey PresharedKey = # wg genpsk > host-client.psk AllowedIPs = 10.0.0.2/32 Client [Interface] PrivateKey = # wg genkey > client.key Address = 10.0.0.2/24 # not sure if this should match host's peer setting #DNS = 1.1.1.1, 1.0.0.1 [Peer] PublicKey = # host's pubkey PresharedKey = # wg genpsk > host-client.
